text: Judd Gregg (born February 14, 1947) is an American politician. He was a United States Senator from the state of New Hampshire. Before becoming a U.S. Senator, he was Governor of New Hampshire from 1989 to 1993. Gregg was born on February 14, 1947 in Nashua, New Hampshire. He studied at Columbia University and at Boston University School of Law. He is married to Kathleen MacLellan Gregg. They have two children. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from New Hampshire Category:Boston University alumni Category:Columbia University alumni Category:Governors of New Hampshire Category:United States representatives from New Hampshire Category:United States senators from New Hampshire Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Nashua, New Hampshire
title: Judd Gregg
